title: Metacognitive and Presence Enhancement Strategies in Online Case-Based Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of core secondary-level mathematics concepts, basic proficiency in online learning platform utilization
context.additional_context: Enhancing metacognition and online collaboration skills for pre-service/in-service teachers through math cases reflecting real classroom situations

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three metacognitive strategies for monitoring and adjusting their thinking processes during case analysis.
Learners can apply communication techniques (e.g., responsive feedback, nonverbal communication) to enhance social presence in online environments.
Learners can reconstruct math cases using co-regulation strategies during collaborative problem-solving with peer teachers.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
